__TOC__

=== Goal ===
To create a local mirror of the Ubuntu repositories for fast updating of lab

=== Materials ===
* Edubuntu server 
* USB hard drive (160 gigs) plugged into server
* Local network of Ubuntu,Kubuntu, Xubuntu, and Edubuntu machines

=== Procedure ===

# <code>sudo apt-get install apt-mirror apache2</code> (make sure universe is enabled)
# Now edit <code>/etc/apt/mirror.list</code> to include the following lines: {{{
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu feisty main restricted universe multiverse
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu feisty-updates main restricted universe multiverse
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu feisty-security main restricted universe multiverse}}}
# Uncomment set base_path  and change its value to /media/disc/apt-mirror 
# Run apt-mirror(as root)
# Do a symlink from /media/disk/apt-mirror to /var/www/apt-mirror
# Edit the sources.list on networked machines to refer to server

=== Debmirror Procedure ===
# <code>sudo apt-get install debmirror apache2</code>
# Run <code>/usr/bin/debmirror <location of mirror>  --nosource -v -m --passive  --host=mirrors.easynews.com --root=:mirrors/linux/ubuntu --method=rsync --progress --dist=feisty,feisty-security, --ignore-release-gpg  --section=main,restricted,universe,multiverse  --arch=i386,amd64</code> where <location of mirror> is the path where the mirror shall be located.
# Do a symlink from the location of the mirror  to /var/www/ubuntu
# Edit the sources.list on networked machines to refer to server
